name: Falling Blocks (itch) (LowBobUser)
description:
What is Falling Blocks?

In this game you have to dodge falling blocks. duh :P
You move from left to right with either the arrow keys, a and d or the mouse buttons.

This is based on a Tutorial from Sebastian Lague, with a few added Features like:

  1.  Levels with increasing difficulty
  2.  A main menu and a Level Select
  3.  Sounds* 

*The Sounds are from freesounds.org: 

  • DeathSound
  • GameOverAmbiente
  • IngameMusic
